result.name: Exhibit 13: Sustained Coalitions Vision Guiding Action

row1.item: vision, mission, and goals are documented. (n=112)

row2.item: vision, mission, and goals take into account what is happening in the community. (n=113)

row3.item: member organizations agree on the coalition’s vision, mission, and goals. (n=113)

row4.item: member organizations are committed to pursuing activities to achieve the coalition’s vision, mission, and goals. (n=112)

row5.item: vision, mission, and goals are understood by residents and institutions in your community. (n=113)

row6.item: vision, mission, and goals are periodically re-evaluated or updated. (n=113)

row7.item: activities are evaluated in relation to its vision, mission, and goals. (n=113)
